DOC.brief_summary: Several psychiatric adverse events (eg, depression, fatigue, psychoses, behavior troubles, anxiety, irritability, deteriorated concentration, and insomnia) that are likely to occur during the treatment course with PegIntron plus Rebetol may prompt patients to discontinue their treatment early. The goal of this study is to assess whether a psychotherapy support program may contribute to a better adherence rate.
DOC.brief_title: Adherence in Patients Receiving PegIntron/Rebetol for Hepatitis C in Conjunction With a Psychotherapy Support Program (Study P04252)
DOC.detailed_description: Enrollment of participants will occur in a sequential order of treatment initiation.
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with hepatitis C According to the products' labeling
